title.rendered: Amazon strategy with Robin Gaster of Incumetrics

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:30 — 26.1MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 28:30 — 26.1MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Robin Gaster, is the author of “Behemoth Rising”. He will be talking about why it is important to educate yourself about this stuff as a 3P seller or Ecommerce seller.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • What Robin Gater wrote about in his book about the gig economy.
  • About the nature of Amazon
  • That Amazon doesn’t want compliance; they want belief
  • That there is no protection offered in Amazon
